deliver_gold_ingot.goal: SURVIVAL SAFE: Start at/near surface spawn, follow strict tool progression (wood -> stone -> iron), mine gold ore, smelt at least 1 gold ingot, then deliver the gold ingot to the nearest player.
instructions: GLOBAL RULES (ALWAYS APPLY):
A. Do NOT skip phases. Do NOT search for future resources early. Complete each phase stockpile first.
B. Stay near the original spawn/work area unless the phase explicitly requires going underground.
C. Survival safety: If it becomes nighttime OR you see hostile mobs nearby, immediately execute NIGHT PROTOCOL.
D. Death recovery: If you die at any point, immediately execute RECOVERY PROTOCOL before continuing the task.
NIGHT PROTOCOL (SURVIVAL):
N1. Dig a 1x1 hole straight down 2 blocks (or find a dirt/stone wall).
N2. Step into the hole and place blocks above you to fully seal (no openings).
N3. Wait until daytime. Then unseal and continue from the last incomplete step.
RECOVERY PROTOCOL (IF YOU DIE):
R1. Return to the approximate coordinates of your death as quickly and safely as possible.
R2. Pick up all dropped items (especially tools, crafting table, furnace, ingots/ore).
R3. If mobs prevent recovery, wait at a safe distance until daytime, then recover items.
PHASE 1 — WOOD + CRAFTING TABLE (DO NOT craft tools yet; DO NOT search for stone/iron/gold):
1. Collect at least 12 logs from nearby trees (enough for tools + charcoal fallback).
2. Convert ALL logs into planks (keep at least 32 planks total).
3. Craft at least 8 sticks total (so you never run out mid-crafting).
4. Craft 1 crafting table and PLACE it on the ground at your work area (near spawn).
5. Confirm you can access the crafting table (stand next to it). If you cannot, place it again.
PHASE 2 — WOODEN PICKAXE -> COBBLESTONE STOCKPILE (DO NOT search for iron/gold):
6. Using the placed crafting table, craft 1 wooden pickaxe.
7. Mine stone until you have at least 32 cobblestone total (this must cover: stone tools + furnace + spare).
8. Return to the crafting table work area before crafting the next tool.
PHASE 3 — STONE PICKAXE -> IRON ORE STOCKPILE (DO NOT search for gold):
9. Using the crafting table, craft 1 stone pickaxe (keep the remaining cobblestone).
10. Locate a nearby cave entrance OR dig a safe staircase down (do not dig straight down).
11. Mine iron ore with the stone pickaxe until you collect at least 6 raw iron (extra for mistakes + re-crafting).
12. Return to the crafting table work area.
PHASE 4 — FURNACE + FUEL -> SMELT IRON -> IRON PICKAXE:
13. Using the crafting table, craft 1 furnace using exactly 8 cobblestone and PLACE it beside the crafting table.
14. Fuel requirement: Obtain at least 8 coal. If coal is not found quickly, make charcoal: smelt logs into charcoal until you have at least 8 fuel items total.
15. Smelt raw iron in the furnace until you have at least 3 iron ingots (preferably 4+).
16. Using the crafting table, craft 1 iron pickaxe.
PHASE 5 — IRON PICKAXE -> GOLD ORE -> GOLD INGOT:
17. Go underground to gold depth: below Y=32 (deeper is fine). Use safe staircases and place blocks to avoid falls.
18. Mine gold ore with the iron pickaxe until you collect at least 2 raw gold (extra to avoid edge cases).
19. Return to your furnace (or craft/place a new furnace if you are far and cannot return safely).
20. Smelt raw gold in the furnace until you have at least 1 gold ingot in inventory.
PHASE 6 — DELIVER:
21. Locate the nearest player (stay safe; avoid mobs).
22. Walk to the player and drop exactly 1 gold ingot in front of them.
23. Stop.
